trends: There have been no other sightings in San Antonio Heights
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsi was over at my girls house and decided to go home. upon arrival i exited my vehicle and looked up at the mountains, it had been a little overcast earlier and from the left side of the dam over was just clear as a bell. the right side of the dam out towards fontana was still a little overcast. as i'm standing there just about to turn and go inside the house i saw something that caught my eye moving toward the dam.to my suprise i saw six round balls of light going towards the dam. i took a few seconds to gather myself and realize what i was looking at was something out of the ordinary.the balls seemed to hover at very slow rate of speeds. moving just a little to the left or right of the dam.and then when they got over the dam they just took off to the right into cloud cover .i looked for them for a few more minutes but to no avail. i remember at that time thinking there is no way that anyone will believe what i just saw.but i did. i just wanted to know if anyone else in or around upland ca. saw the same thing that i did.please let me know.
